page.title: 04WHAT'S ON - BARGOED AREA
page.content: CUTEST BABY - This week's first prize goes to Lisa Jane Hagerty age 11 months of Commercial Street Aberbargoed. "SMARTIE GIRLS" - pictured on their float at the Aberbargoed Carnival. Report and more pictures in your Express next week. BARGOED GOLF CLUB - Steward/Stewardess required. Catering ability essential. Reply to Secretary by 12th July 1985. COACH HOLIDAYS WITH CLED WILLIAMS'S COACHES, GILFACH. - Scotland, Blackpool, Isle of Wight. Prices from Â£95 to Â£150 per week. MALCOLM PHILLIPS MONUMENTAL SCULPTOR. Suppliers of granite and marble memorials. Estimates for renovations (Open Thursdays and Fridays). Cardiff Road, Bargoed. Tel. 0685 871600 ( after hours).
